name: Cats Fishing 3
description:
For Project 3 of DATT 2300.

Please note that the in the browser version the "Quit" button does end the game, it's just the game stays visible. The webpage will need to be reloaded to replay if you hit "Quit".

Assets Used:

Background, fish sprites, and particle textures https://ansimuz.itch.io/underwater-diving

Bomb fish sound (pop) https://freesound.org/people/DuffyBro/sounds/319107/

Camera shake code https://gist.github.com/ftvs/5822103

Collecting gold fish sound (ding) https://freesound.org/people/pjhedman/sounds/511397/

Music https://soundcloud.com/pascalbelisle

Player movement sound (bubbles) https://freesound.org/people/kwahmah_02/sounds/261597/
